name: Lalbagh Fort
description: Lalbagh Fort is an iconic historical fort in the heart of Old Dhaka.

description: Ahsan Manzil is the former residential palace of the Nawab of Dhaka.

description: Jatiyo Sangsad Bhaban is the National Parliament House of Bangladesh.

name: Dhakeshwari Temple
description: Dhakeshwari Temple is a Hindu temple in Dhaka dedicated to Goddess Dhakeshwari.

name: National Museum of Bangladesh
description: National Museum of Bangladesh showcases the rich cultural heritage of the country.

name: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is the longest sea beach in the world.

description: Patenga Sea Beach is a popular tourist destination in Chattagram.

name: Hill Tracts
description: Explore the scenic beauty of the Hill Tracts region in Chattagram.

name: Chittagong Ship Breaking Yard
description: Chittagong Ship Breaking Yard is one of the world's largest ship breaking yards.

name: Foy's Lake
description: Foy's Lake is a popular recreational spot in Chattagram.

name: Sundarbans
description: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Bagerhat
description: Bagerhat is known for its historic mosque city, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Mongla Port
description: Mongla Port is the second-largest seaport in Bangladesh.

name: Sixty Dome Mosque
description: Sixty Dome Mosque is an ancient mosque in Bagerhat.

name: Dobhi Danga
description: Dobhi Danga is a picturesque spot in the Sundarbans.

name: Varendra Research Museum
description: Varendra Research Museum is the oldest museum in Bangladesh.

description: Bara Kuthi is a historical site in Natore, Rajshahi.

name: Dhopadighi Eco-Park
description: Dhopadighi Eco-Park is a serene eco-park in Rajshahi.

description: Ratargul Swamp Forest is the only swamp forest in Bangladesh.

name: Jaflong
description: Jaflong is a scenic area known for its tea gardens, hills, and rivers.

name: Bisnakandi
description: Bisnakandi is a beautiful riverine area surrounded by hills.

name: Lalakhal
description: Lalakhal is a pristine blue river surrounded by greenery.

description: SUST is one of the most renowned universities in Bangladesh.

name: Tajhat Palace
description: Tajhat Palace is a historic palace and a popular tourist attraction.

description: rangpur Zoo is a zoological park with diverse wildlife.

name: Begum Rokeya Memorial Center
description: Begum Rokeya Memorial Center pays tribute to the renowned feminist writer Begum Rokeya.

description: Carmichael College is one of the oldest colleges in Bangladesh.

description: Bhawal National Park is a nature reserve and wildlife sanctuary.

description: Baliati Palace is an ancient zamindar's palace with a historical significance.

description: Bangladesh Agricultural University is a leading agricultural institution.

description: The Brahmaputra River flows through the picturesque landscapes of Mymensingh.

name: Jamuna Future Park
description: Jamuna Future Park is one of the largest shopping malls in South Asia.
